content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
replace this whole section with a new hero that has a top call to action and then a bottom testimontial section. use a bright purple shaded theme with rounded/beveled edges and

Sure, I understand you're requesting to replace the current section with a new hero section with a bright purple shaded theme, rounded/beveled edges, and a top call to action followed by a bottom testimonial section. I'm on it!
